name: CxenseAdSDK
summary: Ad serving for display, rich media, and mobile advertising
description:
Cxense Ad boosts digital advertising revenue for publishers. 

Cxense Ad integrates with Cxense DMP (Data Management Platform), enabling publishers to segment their audience and target ads to specific site visitors, increasing advertising effectiveness, relevance and revenue.

* Engage users with relevant ads based on context or interests.

* Offer an integrated solution on multiple platforms.

* Optimize campaigns with precision and forecasting.

* Full integration with the DMP: migrate specific user segments into Ad to drive targeted ads and increase revenue.

* Detailed reports to measure and optimize ad revenue.
